QuestData.Title: Shadra the Venom Queen
QuestData.Description: <The ground rumbles as the idol sits on the altar, and the lake below roils! Shadra is emerging!>
QuestData.RewardText: Excellently done. You have served the Dark Lady well today, $n.$B$BThis virulent blood will supply our armies with all manner of powerful weapons against the disgusting Alliance. We will wipe them from these lands.$B$BFor the Horde, of course... and all thanks to you.
